name: Pro Basketball Manager 2017
description: Take on the role of coach of your own team with Pro Basketball Manager 2017. Start your career as head of the team of your choice, be they rookies or legends, and lead your players to victory!
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS 7/WINDOWS 8/WINDOWS 10 Processor: AMD/INTEL DUAL-CORE 2.5 GHZ Memory: 3072 MB RAM Graphics: 768 MB 100% DIRECTX 10 AND SHADERS 4.0 COMPATIBLE ATI RADEON HD 5670/NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 260 OR HIGHER Sound Card: DIRECTX COMPATIBLE
